      • setEvents

        public void setEvents(java.util.List<Event>[] eventArray,
                      java.util.List<Event>[] allDayEvents,
                      long firstDayStartMillis)
        Update event data to be displayed
        Parameters:
        eventArray - list of List of normal events, a List for each day
        allDayEvents - list of List of all day events, a List for each day
        firstDayStartMillis - millis (since epoch) of the start of the first day in this group
